message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm happy to offer it for $20,000.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I believe I can find it elsewhere within my budget. I am willing to pay up to $12,000 for the product.
Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your position, but $12,000 is quite a bit lower than what I'm hoping for. Could we meet in the middle at $17,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget constraints, I am comfortable to pay $15,000 for the product.
